code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Advanced=()=>{const[inputString,setInputString]=useState("");const[outputValue,setOutputValue]=useState(null);const transitionFunction=(state,symbol)=>{if(state==="S0"){if(symbol==="0")return"S0";if(symbol==="1")return"S1";}else if(state==="S1"){if(symbol==="0")return"S2";if(symbol==="1")return"S0";}else if(state==="S2"){if(symbol==="0")return"S1";if(symbol==="1")return"S2";}throw new Error("Invalid transition: ".concat(state," --").concat(symbol,"--> ?"));};const calculateModuloThree=()=>{let currentState="S0";try{for(let i=0;i<inputString.length;i++){const currentInput=inputString[i];if(currentInput!=="0"&&currentInput!=="1"){throw new Error("Invalid symbol: ".concat(currentInput));}currentState=transitionFunction(currentState,currentInput);}if(currentState==="S0"){setOutputValue(0);}else if(currentState==="S1"){setOutputValue(1);}else if(currentState==="S2"){setOutputValue(2);}}catch(error){setOutputValue(null);console.error(error.message);}};const handleInputChange=e=>{setInputString(e.target.value);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Advanced"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{style:{display:"none"},htmlFor:"inputString",children:"Input string"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"inputString",value:inputString,onChange:handleInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:calculateModuloThree,children:"Calculate"}),outputValue!==null&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Output value: ",outputValue]})]});};export default Advanced;
